content.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
content.text: By creating an account or using our app, you agree to these Terms of Service.

content.heading: 2. Use of Service
content.text: You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with all applicable laws.

content.heading: 3. Account Security
content.text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login details and all activities under your account.

content.heading: 4. Changes to Terms
content.text: We may update these Terms from time to time. Continued use of the service means you accept the updated Terms.
